summary: A mixin that supplies a comprehensive suite of integration tests for the generation capabilities of language models, covering diverse decoding strategies, input handling, masking, token termination, scoring, and multimodal conditioning across both decoder‑only and encoder‑decoder architectures.
business_intent: To verify and maintain the correctness and stability of the model generation API, providing automated regression checks that catch regressions or misbehaviors in various generation scenarios, thereby supporting reliable deployment of NLP models.
